About me

Hi! I'm Michael Lancaster. (23y). Brazilian-American. Highly motivated and passionate to development and open source projects going from Web Applications, SPA's to mobile development.
Always looking/experimenting new ways to improve my skills and make better products.

Working as Web Engineer for Leo Burnett Worldwide building great products.
I was also Front - End Engineer consultant for HP in Brazil helping JSP developers with JS(jQuery)
And worked in two other Agencies building things for big companies in the industry of Sugar, Oleo, Bank, clothes, health, education and more.

I also like to contribute to open source projects on Github when I'm not working on my side projects.

  • Specialties:
  • - HTML5
  • - CSS3
  • - JS
  • - Git
  • - Responsive Design, mobile friendly
  • - Focused on performance and UI/UX.

  • Current interests:
  • - client-side MV* Frameworks
  • - Node.js
